problem.markdown:
>>The increase in abundance of Didymo (Rock Snot) is most harmful to:<< () swimmers who might consume rock snot () streamflow (x) stream biodiversity () marine organisms () canoes and kayaks
[explanation] Didymo populations form along stream beds, where they can out compete the species that live there, thereby reducing biodiversity. [explanation]
problem.p: The increase in abundance of Didymo (Rock Snot) is most harmful to:

choicegroup.label: The increase in abundance of Didymo (Rock Snot) is most harmful to:
choicegroup.choice: swimmers who might consume rock snot

div.p: Didymo populations form along stream beds, where they can out compete the species that live there, thereby reducing biodiversity.
